location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'CORRECTIONS TO ROUTES IN PERSIA VOLUME II. (NORTH-WESTERN PERSIA.)'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the volume also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume is a Government of India official publication entitled Corrections to Routes in Persia Volume II. (North-Western Persia.) (First Series, 1926) General Staff India(Simla, Government of India Press, 1926).The volume contains corrections to details of land routes.

name.namePart: Government of India Press, Simla, publishers
